Take treatment bowl.sentence: The nurse prepares the treatment bowl by gathering all necessary supplies.
Take treatment bowl.subject: The nurse

Take treatment bowl.sentence: The nurse ensures that the treatment bowl is clean and sanitized before use.
Take treatment bowl.subject: The nurse
Take treatment bowl.object: the treatment bowl is clean and sanitized

Take treatment bowl.sentence: The nurse fills the treatment bowl with the appropriate solution or medication as prescribed.
Take treatment bowl.subject: The nurse
Take treatment bowl.object: the treatment bowl with the appropriate solution or medication

Take treatment bowl.sentence: The nurse checks the temperature of the solution in the treatment bowl to ensure it is safe for the patient.
Take treatment bowl.subject: The nurse
Take treatment bowl.object: the temperature of the solution in the treatment bowl

Take treatment bowl.sentence: The nurse presents the treatment bowl to the patient and explains the procedure clearly.
Take treatment bowl.subject: The nurse
Take treatment bowl.object: the treatment bowl to the patient
